scenes.slugline: INT. FITTS HOUSE - RICKY'S BEDROOM - NIGHT
scenes.action_text: On VIDEO: JANE BURNHAM lays in bed, wearing a tank top. She's sixteen, with dark, intense eyes. JANE I need a father who's a role model, not some horny geek-boy who's gonna spray his shorts whenever I bring a girlfriend home from school. (snorts) What a lame-o. Somebody really should put him out of his misery. Her mind wanders for a beat. RICKY (O.C.) Want me to kill him for you? Jane looks at us and sits up.
